definition: half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half

sentences.english: The moon still hangs low in the sky, casting dim yellow light.
sentences.chinese: 那半个月亮仍悬在半空，发出昏黄的光。

sentences.english: A whirlwind catches me in midair and places me safely on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 一阵旋风在半空中把我托住，使我安全返回地面。

sentences.english: She flew over him, coming to a stop upside down in midair, out of sight below.
sentences.chinese: 她从他头顶飞过，在视野之外的半空中倒悬着停住了。

sentences.english: Ski then trapped in the air to help 220 passengers ski rescue.
sentences.chinese: 滑雪场随即协助被困在半空中的220名滑雪客脱困。

sentences.english: The while speaking clear Mei has already trod on knife light, the powder natural and unrestrainedly rises to midair.
sentences.chinese: 说话间明寐已经踏上剑光，粉潇洒的升到半空中。

sentences.english: When salt and pepper shakers are greasy to touch or half empty .
sentences.chinese: 盐及胡椒瓶是油滑的，或是半空的。

sentences.english: When the load was in transit in the mid-air, a strong wind caused it to swing sideways.
sentences.chinese: 当负载运送到半空，强风引致负载向一边摇摆。

sentences.english: And off a blossom in mid-air stands still.
sentences.chinese: 忽而静静地在半空如一树繁花。

sentences.english: A gust of wind and the sky darkened.
sentences.chinese: 一阵风过去，天暗起来，灰尘全飞到半空。

sentences.english: A skull appeared suspended in the gloom of the doorway.
sentences.chinese: 在黑魆魆的门洞里仿佛出现了一个悬在半空的骷髅。

sentences.english: He shot at me with an arrow, but I held up my hands and it stopped in mid-air.
sentences.chinese: 他便以箭射我，然我举起手来，弓箭便停在半空之中。

sentences.english: Free-running involves a lot of trick moves, particularly mid-air flips and spins.
sentences.chinese: 自由奔跑包括许多技巧动作，尤其是半空弹跳与旋转。

sentences.english: His carving-knife was still poised in the air .
sentences.chinese: 他的餐刀依然悬在半空。

sentences.english: Hong Ying empty broken 7906, white eye Sanmeng air strike bell.
sentences.chinese: 洪英半空碎抛盘，白三蒙眼空中击铃铛。

sentences.english: Spider can not fly , yet he could make a perfect net in midair.
sentences.chinese: 蜘蛛不会飞翔，但它能够把网凌结在半空中。

definition: be high up in the sky
to float/to hover/also written 漂浮
silvery light/bright white light/shining white light
to flutter/to dance in the breeze
